summary: A model class that wraps an ESM (Evolutionary Scale Modeling) architecture for token classification tasks, enabling per‑token predictions such as residue‑level annotations in protein sequences.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use deep‑learning component for bioinformatics applications that require labeling each token (amino‑acid) in a protein sequence, leveraging pretrained ESM weights to accelerate research and development.
